Animals

From the quiet watch of deer at the forest’s edge to the quick shimmer of dragonfly wings over a pond, animals bring motion and story to every landscape. This section gathers the many forms of life that share our fields and woodlands — mammals, birds, insects, amphibians, and arachnids — each captured in their natural rhythm. Whether large or small, every creature here plays a part in the living fabric of the wild places we explore.
